sentences.english: These hypothesized functions for PPD are far from proved.
sentences.chinese: 這些對於產後抑鬱症作用的假設還遠未得到證實。

sentences.english: The retained fetal membranes has caused great ecological damage to the breeding of dairy cows.
sentences.chinese: 奶牛產後胎衣不下對奶牛業造成極大的經濟損失。

sentences.english: The Effect of Nursing Intervention on Improvement of Anxiety and Depression in DM Patients;
sentences.chinese: 目的探討酚妥拉明治療產後尿瀦留的護理干預效果。

sentences.english: Results Severe PIH and postpartum hemorrhage were the major factors that led to MOF.
sentences.chinese: 結果導致MOF的主要因素爲重度妊高徵及產後出血。

sentences.english: A female stinkbug lays 300 to 400 eggs at a time, and dies after the eggs are laid.
sentences.chinese: 一隻雌蠋蝽每次產卵三百至四百粒，產後便死去。

sentences.english: Some men ended up with a male equivalent of postnatal depression, he said.
sentences.chinese: 他說，有些男人也患上了產後抑鬱症。

sentences.english: To observe the clinic effects of preventive application of antibiotic in incision of perineum in postpartum.
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察產後會陰切口預防性應用抗生素的臨牀效果。

sentences.english: Therefore, more and more post-natal thin.
sentences.chinese: 所以產後的瘦子越來越多。

sentences.english: Lochia rubra will recurred several times during puerperium, especially in CS group.
sentences.chinese: 產後惡露具有波動性，尤其是剖宮產組。

sentences.english: Objective To study the curative effect of a combined treatment of postpartum haemorrhage with misoprostol and calcium agent.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討米索前列醇加鈣劑治療產後出血療效。

sentences.english: Postpartum repair also has golden period, do you know?
sentences.chinese: 產後修復也有黃金期，你知道嗎？

sentences.english: Primary efficacy endpoints was the incidences of micturition syncope after parturition.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討提前護理干預對產後排尿性暈厥的效果。

sentences.english: Postpartum women usually have to bogey cold, but living lotus may from time to bogey.
sentences.chinese: 通常婦女產後要忌冷食，但維生蓮藕可不忌。

sentences.english: Is how long menstruates for after the childbirth regular?
sentences.chinese: 產後多久來月經是正常的？

sentences.english: But do you know whether the animals are in confinement or not?
sentences.chinese: 你是對的，但你知道動物產後是否也坐月子呢？

sentences.english: To your hospital was born to do, then post-natal check is free of charge.
sentences.chinese: 到你所生的那家醫院去做產後檢查的話是免費的。

definition: woman recuperating after childbirth/woman in childbirth
to have a miscarriage/miscarriage/to fail/to fall through
(of a surgeon) to perform an operation/(of a patient) to have an operation/to decapitate/to behead/to single out as a point of attack
to face childbirth/about to give birth/refers esp. to the onset of regular contractions
